doc.field: Includes negatives and contact sheets of HRL at a magazine publishers event; HRL on the podium at the Waldorf Astoria for the Harry Johnson Fisher Award; a contact sheet of HRL being presented with the 1964 Socratic award by the Order of Ahepa; HRL with Henry Luce III and others at the Taiwan airport; HRL with Henry Luce III and others at the opening of the Los Angeles Times New York office; HRL with Hedley Donovan and various photos of the Luce-Donovan dinner; HRL with James A. Rhodes; HRL in Cleveland with Louis B. Seltzer, James A. Rhodes and Allen James Lowe; HRL at the 1964 political convention; HRL with Charles Galvin and Robert G. Storey standing in front of the Umphrey Lee Memorial to the Rule of Law; HRL accepting the Great Leaders Award from Robert G. Storey; a bust of Socrates; HRL with Queen Frederika and daughter Irene (of Greece and Denmark); HRL at the San Francisco Republican National Convention?; HRL at a meeting of the Graphic Arts?; and HRL with Jesse Birnbaum.
